column2: This thin metal barrel is not an impressive sight, but the destruction it can cause inspires awe and fear in equal measure. Due to a highly explosive black powder it can fire metal balls at deadly speeds.

column2: There is more to this round little metal object than what meets the eye. The symbols running along its edge, the inner row being movable through a rotating disc, allows its owner to encipher and decipher with ease.

column6: Este disco es más de lo que parece a simple vista. En su círculo exterior hay unos símbolos, y el disco interior, que se puede girar, permite cifrar y descifrar con facilidad.

column2: This impressive set of armor is clearly ahead of its time. Consisting of whole plates of metal held together by cleverly designed joints, it provides its wearer with significant defense as well as mobility.

column6: No cabe duda de que esta impresionante armadura es muy avanzada para su época. Consiste en placas metálicas ligadas mediante remaches de un diseño inteligente, y otorga una gran protección a su portador, así como movilidad.
